application.name: apolloPanPVL2Net
application.brief: Convert a pvl from apollopanprocess to two control networks.
application.description: This program takes a pvl file from apollopanprocess and produces two control network files, a fiducial net named TO_fid.net and a timing net named TO_timing.net.

parameter.name: FIDUCIALNET
parameter.brief: The input fiducial mark control network
parameter.description: The input fiducial mark control network

parameter.name: TIMINGNET
parameter.brief: The input timing mark control network
parameter.description: The input timing mark control network

parameter.name: ORIGINALPVL
parameter.brief: The original pvl file for the image
parameter.description: The original pvl file for the image
